snippet.title: Kindred // Cinematic Trailer
snippet.description:
Play the Game ►

In this touching story exploring the fragile bonds of brotherhood, you control a mysterious ghostly force. Use your powers of possession to manipulate objects and guide a curious young boy toward a discovery that will forever change his life. The choices you make will affect this boy's grieving mind, driving him to despair or providing closure. What sort of spirit will you be?

Developed by
Liam Davidson
